overview:
Kauzu is a social venture dedicated to transforming how job seekers and employers connect. We share common goals with community centers and workforce development agencies—strengthening communities by helping people find jobs.

Our first product is Kauzu.Jobs, the first mobile web application that pinpoints jobs based on the job seeker’s location.

“Kauzu” is the Esperanto word for “cause.” The name reflects our focus on creating social change by making the job search process faster and more productive.
